backend/main.mo: Main canister actor setting up access control, storage maps, ID counters, event logging, and feature-spec data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high‑level features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for many frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and docs.
frontend/docs/data-architecture.md: Documentation of authentication, role model, first‑admin bootstrap, and React Query–based data consistency.
frontend/docs/design-direction.md: Design spec describing the dark‑fantasy aesthetic, color system, typography, spacing, and interaction styles.
frontend/docs/local-storage-strategy.md: Documentation of local‑only and canister‑backed storage, offline drafts, mutation queue, and cache invalidation rules.
frontend/docs/phase1-features-by-page.md: Lists Phase 1 UI skeleton features and future enhancements for each site page, covering homepage through admin panel.
frontend/docs/phase1-planning.md: Outlines project architecture, site map, navigation, access levels, and Phase 1 implementation scope.
frontend/docs/phase6-qa-test-plan.md: Provides manual QA test cases for authentication, role access, shop flows, and multi-device/browser testing.
Describes the feedback workflow, offline-first architecture, admin review flow, and update checklist for iterative development.
frontend/docs/production-deployment.md: Explains deployment steps for backend and frontend on IC or static hosts, including environment variables and build commands.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template setting metadata, root element, and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router and React Query, lazy-loads pages, defines all application routes, and renders the app with a suspense loader.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamSectio: Renders a team section with flip-card profiles of predefined team members including bios and expertise.
frontend/src/components/about/TimelineSe: Displays a vertical milestone timeline using card components for key historical events.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminFeedb: Empty placeholder file for an admin feedback tab component.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Displays all orders with filtering options and opens a tracking detail modal for selected orders.
Provides a modal for viewing and updating order tracking details, including status changes, location updates, and notes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Empty placeholder file for an admin products tab component.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReque: Shows detailed request info and provides actions for approving, declining, messaging customers, sending coupons, and converting requests to orders.
Lists all user requests with status, pricing, and attachments, and supports viewing request details in a modal.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminTesti: Displays submitted testimonies with approval status and previews of attached photos or videos.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUsers: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/admin/MessageAtt: Manages file attachment selection and upload with size validation, progress tracking, and attachment removal.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/AdminP: Allows admins to reset other admin passwords with principal validation and basic hashing before submission.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/AdminR: Enables promoting or demoting admins and displays the current admin registry with principal validation.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Advanc: Provides controls for toggling shop availability, overriding product prices, and changing product visibility.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Analyt: Displays a snapshot of site analytics with loading states, error handling, refresh functionality, and metric cards.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Coupon: Provides a global switch to enable or disable all coupons, showing status, alerts, and loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Portfo: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/QuoteR: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Testim: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and logout cleanup logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form for collecting and saving a user's name and email during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Gatekeeper component that restricts access to admin-only areas based on identity and user role.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Protects routes by requiring user authentication and prompting login if identity is missing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireOwne: Restricts access to owner-only areas, verifying authentication and ownership before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactP: Renders a FAQ accordion with predefined questions and answers about shipping, authenticity, returns, and care.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/GuildO: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Invent: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OrderT: Displays an order's tracking status, latest notes, and location updates using various UI components.
frontend/src/components/effects/FadeInSe: Wraps content in a fade‑in animation triggered on scroll, respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/components/effects/FlipCard: Interactive flip card component that toggles between front and back views with accessibility and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/effects/Parallax: Provides a parallax scrolling effect using requestAnimationFrame, with reduced‑motion fallback.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Feedbac: Empty placeholder for a feedback dialog component.
Empty placeholder for a feedback launcher component.
frontend/src/components/home/Announcemen: Renders a list of static announcement cards with badges, dates, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCar: Carousel displaying featured items with navigation controls and detail links.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickLinksG: Grid of navigational quick‑link cards leading to major site sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with background, header, footer, random quotes, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer containing branding, navigation links, legal links, and a credit section.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header navigation with desktop and mobile menus, authentication-based actions, and admin links.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Wrapper component that provides optional page title and description around children content.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Empty file placeholder for a portfolio details modal component.
Empty file placeholder for a portfolio widget section component.
frontend/src/components/quotes/RandomQuo: Displays 2–3 random quotes using a card layout, refreshed on navigation.
frontend/src/components/requests/Request: Media picker allowing image/video uploads with validation, previews, progress tracking, and removal.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Accordion listing service offerings with icons, summaries, detailed descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductDeta: Modal showing full product details, availability info, pricing, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductFlip: Flip-card product display with front image/price and back overview, availability info, and detail button.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopCartDra: Drawer component for displaying and managing the shopping cart, including coupon validation and checkout handling.
frontend/src/components/shop/useShopFilt: Custom hook providing search, stock filtering, and sorting logic for shop product lists.
frontend/src/components/system/Analytics: Tracks page views on initial load and route changes using the app’s analytics system.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: Top-level error boundary that logs errors locally and displays a recovery UI with reload and troubleshooting options.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: UI component for displaying error messages with special handling for offline or network-related issues.
frontend/src/components/system/Troublesh: Dialog that displays locally stored error logs with options to inspect details and clear the log.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Crea: Dialog for submitting testimonies with photos and videos, including validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Star: Renders a star-based rating display with optional configurable maximum.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Test: Flip-card component that shows testimony media on the front and its description on the back, supporting images and video playback.
Component for selecting, validating, uploading, previewing, and managing photo/video testimony media with size and type checks.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/useH: Hook that auto-plays a video on hover and pauses it otherwise using a ref.
frontend/src/data/quotes.ts: Exports a static list of themed quotes used throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalErrorCapture: Registers global handlers for errors and unhandled promise rejections and logs them.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Hook that detects when an element enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalCart.ts: Manages a persistent shopping cart in localStorage with add, update, and remove helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDrafts.ts: Stores form drafts in localStorage with expiration and provides load, save, and clear operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using navigator events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference with cross-browser support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping canister actor calls for profiles, roles, admin management, and registry operations with caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueuedMutations.ts: Empty placeholder file for queued mutation-related hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomQuotes.ts: Hook that returns 2–3 stable random quotes per route, regenerating on pathname change.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentlyViewed.ts: Manages a recently viewed products list using localStorage with add, load, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Persists component state across sessions via localStorage with session IDs and expiry handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color themes, dark mode, fonts, animations, and layout utilities.
frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts: Lightweight analytics module supporting first‑party logging or Google Analytics with pageview and event tracking.
frontend/src/lib/errorLogging.ts: Local client-side error logging utilities with storage, sanitization, and retrieval helpers.
frontend/src/lib/localStorage.ts: Versioned, expiry-aware localStorage wrapper with safe read/write, cleanup, and quota handling.
frontend/src/lib/offlineMutationQueue.ts: Implements a persistent offline mutation queue with enqueue, retry, fail marking, and cleanup operations.
frontend/src/lib/randomQuotes.ts: Utility that randomly selects 2–3 unique quotes from the quotes array.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders an About page with creator background, mission, and vision sections using animated components.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for managing orders, requests, and testimonies, gated by admin auth.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPlus.tsx: Owner-only Admin+ panel providing analytics, shop controls, coupon management, admin registry, and password tools.
frontend/src/pages/BlogLore.tsx: Displays a grid of lore-themed blog posts with categories, dates, and read-time metadata.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with a message form, submission handling, and supplemental FAQ section.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard showing profile setup, orders, and tracking data with hooks for fetching and saving user info.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: Renders a searchable FAQ page with categorized accordion items inside a PageLayout.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Displays the main landing page with hero content, featured carousel, quick links, and feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/Inbox.tsx: Shows user inbox items with loading/error states, message and coupon rendering, and refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Presents the site's privacy policy as a series of sections within a styled card layout.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Displays service offerings using an accordion and provides links for custom service requests or contacting support.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Implements the shop page with product fetching, search/filter controls, grid/list views, cart drawer, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitRequest.tsx: Form page for submitting custom requests, handling user profile prefills, media uploads, validation, and request creation.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Static Terms of Service page displaying sections of legal text within a styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/Testimonies.tsx: Page that lists approved customer testimonies, shows loading/error states, and allows logged‑in users to submit new testimonies.
frontend/src/types/common.ts: Defines shared product-related types including visibility, availability, and product structure.
frontend/src/types/orderTracking.ts: Defines order tracking types, status labels, history entries, and helpers for status progression and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/types/phase5a.ts: Phase 5A types for requests and testimonies, including media, pricing preferences, and submission metadata.
frontend/src/types/phase5b.ts: Phase 5B types for detailed request handling, inbox items, statuses, and action history.
frontend/src/utils/mediaValidation.ts: Utility functions for validating media files, descriptions, video duration, and formatting sizes and durations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helper utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, fonts, shadows, and container settings, plus plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state and feature requests, focused on implementing an admin‑driven customer order‑tracking system with statuses, notes, and manual location updates.
